name: Dungeon & Maid
summary:
Explore for hidden scrolls and items!
Each scroll grants the character new power.
Defeat all bosses! Escape the nefarious dungeon alive!

GRIMHELM presents...
- A full HD 2D platforming action game
- 21 varieties of monster and 4 unique bosses
- 22 scenes (44 total)!​
info:
• 平台: Windows Vista / 7 / 8
  • 游戏类型: ACT
  • 发行日期: 2015/09/25

  • 开发: GRIMHELM
